Who Is Not Eligible for a Government Headstone or Marker
The same legislative history, prohibitions, and principles discussed in
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, 1.D.2.b
, relative to the commission of (1) specified offenses involving subversive activities and (2) Federal and State capital/sex crimes, apply equivalently in rendering individuals ineligible for memorialization with government headstones and markers.
